data.title: Larry Miller Obituary 2024
data.meta_description: Larry L. Miller, age 69, of the Fork Creek community, passed away on Friday, March 1, 2024 at his home surrounded by his family and friends. Larry loved playing cards. His passi...
data.text:
Larry L. Miller, age 69, of the Fork Creek community, passed away on Friday, March 1, 2024 at his home surrounded by his family and friends. Larry loved playing cards. His passion was his business, Larryâ€™s Tree Service.

Larry was preceded in death by his parents, Andy K. and Stella Miller; sisters, Susie and Rebecca Miller; brothers, Dennis, Jim, Kenny, and Gary Miller. He is survived by his wife of 44 years, Sharon McCallie Miller; son, John Isaac Miller (Kristi); sisters, Barbara Loveday (Junior), Debbie Richesin, Linda Holt (Paul), and Donna Goddard (Butch); brother, Pete Miller (Sharon); sisters in law, Sonya Miller and Debbie Miller; several nieces, nephews, and extended family members.

The family will receive friends on Sunday, March 3, 2024 from 4-6pm at Loudon Funeral Home. Funeral will follow with Rev. Larry Wilson officiating. Graveside service will be Monday, March 4, 2024 at 11am at Rockville Cemetery.
